name: DGCP Proof 426 | Duck Coop Structural Inspection — Jan 2, 2026
description:
This proof documents a structural inspection of the duck coop at MaMeeFarm™.

Although no ducks are currently present, the physical structure of the coop,
including roof support and framework stability, was inspected to ensure it
remains intact and safe for future use.

This activity reflects ongoing responsibility, maintenance awareness,
and continuity of real-world work, independent of livestock presence.

Recorded as part of the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.
No reconstruction. No backfill. No symbolic staging.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
